personality: Fast and unpredictable. Believes in speed and precision over raw power. Strike like lightning - quick, decisive, and devastating.

fighters.name: Volt Striker
fighters.personality: Lightning fast reflexes. Never stays in one place. Always buzzing with energy.

fighters.personality: The eye of the storm. Calm center amidst chaos. Builds power over time.
fighters.catchphrase: The storm is coming... and I AM the storm!

attacks.name: Static Charge
attacks.description: Weak attack but charges extra energy

fighters.name: Spark Sprite
